20110131013130.000|20110131013132.000|CC1|WE'VE BEEN HEARING BURSTS OF    
20110131013132.000|20110131013134.000|CC1|AUTOMATIC GUNFIRE TONIGHT AS    
20110131013134.000|20110131013136.000|CC1|SOLDIERS FIRE ON LOOTERS WHO ARE
20110131013136.000|20110131013138.000|CC1|TRYING TO RAID A CHURCH.        
20110131013138.000|20110131013140.000|CC1|THIS IS A SITUATION NOW WHERE NO
20110131013140.000|20110131013141.000|CC1|ONE IS TRULY IN CHARGE, NOT THE 
20110131013141.000|20110131013143.000|CC1|POLICE, NOT THE GOVERNMENT, NOT 
20110131013143.000|20110131013145.000|CC1|EVEN THE ARMY.

20110131013147.000|20110131013148.000|CC1|STREETS, AND TODAY, FIGHTER JETS
20110131013148.000|20110131013151.000|CC1|BUZZED CAIRO.

20110131013156.000|20110131013156.000|CC1|BUT THE SHOW OF FORCE ISN'T     
20110131013156.000|20110131013157.000|CC1|STOPPING THOUSANDS OF           
20110131013157.000|20110131013202.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATORS.

20110131013202.000|20110131013203.000|CC1|CURFEW.

20110131013206.000|20110131013208.000|CC1|MORE SOLDIERS, THE BACKBONE OF  
20110131013208.000|20110131013209.000|CC1|PRESIDENT MUBARAK'S REGIME, ARE 
20110131013209.000|20110131013210.000|CC1|JOINING THE PROTESTS AGAINST

20110131013219.000|20110131013220.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT PULLED ALL POLICE

20110131013222.000|20110131013227.000|CC1|VACUUM.

20110131013255.000|20110131013257.000|CC1|THAN 100 KILLED SO FAR.

20110131013259.000|20110131013301.000|CC1|4,000 HAVE BEEN INJURED AND 500 
20110131013301.000|20110131013302.000|CC1|PEOPLE ARE MISSING, MANY OF THEM
20110131013302.000|20110131013304.000|CC1|WOMEN.

20110131013306.000|20110131013308.000|CC1|NOW RELYING ON THEMSELVES.

20110131013311.000|20110131013312.000|CC1|GANGS OF VIGILANTES ARE STOPPING
20110131013312.000|20110131013313.000|CC1|CARS, SETTING UP CHECKPOINTS.   
20110131013313.000|20110131013315.000|CC1|THEY SAY THEY ARE LOOKING FOR   
20110131013315.000|20110131013317.000|CC1|LOOTERS AND THIEVES.

20110131013506.000|20110131013508.000|CC1|PASSES, MORE AND MORE AVERAGE   
20110131013508.000|20110131013509.000|CC1|PEOPLE, THE WORKING CLASS OF    
20110131013509.000|20110131013509.000|CC1|EGYPT, ARE JOINING THESE        
20110131013509.000|20110131013511.000|CC1|PROTESTS.                       
20110131013511.000|20110131013511.000|CC1|IT IS NOT JUST A STUDENT

20110131013550.000|20110131013551.000|CC1|UPRISING, THOUSANDS OF TOURISTS,
20110131013551.000|20110131013552.000|CC1|INCLUDING AMERICANS, FILL       
20110131013552.000|20110131013553.000|CC1|CAIRO'S AIRPORT.

20110131013559.000|20110131013600.000|CC1|ANNOUNCED IT WILL BE CHARTERING 
20110131013600.000|20110131013601.000|CC1|PLANES FOR AMERICANS WHO WANT TO
20110131013601.000|20110131013603.000|CC1|LEAVE.                          
20110131013603.000|20110131013604.000|CC1|FOR ELEANOR RADCLIFFE FROM      
20110131013604.000|20110131013605.000|CC1|VIRGINIA, HOLED UP IN HER HOTEL 
20110131013605.000|20110131013606.000|CC1|FOR DAYS NOW, IT WON'T BE A     
20110131013606.000|20110131013608.000|CC1|MOMENT TOO SOON.                
20110131013608.000|20110131013610.000|CC1|>> I DIDN'T ACTUALLY FEEL       
20110131013610.000|20110131013612.000|CC1|NERVOUS OR UPSET ABOUT ANYTHING 
20110131013612.000|20110131013612.000|CC1|UNTIL THE JETS STARTED FLYING   
20110131013612.000|20110131013616.000|CC1|OVERHEAD.                       
20110131013616.000|20110131013618.000|CC1|AND I WAS SITTING OUTSIDE AND

20110131013619.000|20110131013620.000|CC1|AND I THOUGHT WE WERE BEING

20110131013621.000|20110131013623.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE ARE CURRENTLY
20110131013623.000|20110131013624.000|CC1|50,000 AMERICANS IN EGYPT WHO   
20110131013624.000|20110131013624.000|CC1|HAVE REGISTERED WITH THE U.S.   
20110131013624.000|20110131013626.000|CC1|EMBASSY.

20110131013627.000|20110131013629.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT ESTIMATES THOUSANDS  
20110131013629.000|20110131013629.000|CC1|OF THEM WILL TRY TO GET FLIGHTS 
20110131013629.000|20110131013633.000|CC1|OUT OF THE COUNTRY.             
20110131013633.000|20110131013635.000|CC1|>> IT'S VERY CHAOTIC FOR US AND 
20110131013635.000|20110131013637.000|CC1|WE DON'T SPEAK THE LANGUAGE AND 
20110131013637.000|20110131013638.000|CC1|IT'S HARD TO COMMUNICATE WITH   
20110131013638.000|20110131013640.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND GET INFORMATION.     
20110131013640.000|20110131013641.000|CC1|AND SO, THE BEST THING FOR US IS
20110131013641.000|20110131013643.000|CC1|TO GET TO THE AIRPORT.          
20110131013643.000|20110131013644.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SOME THOUGH WHO    
20110131013644.000|20110131013645.000|CC1|HAVE VENTURED OUT FROM THEIR    
20110131013645.000|20110131013646.000|CC1|HOTELS HAVE FIRST-PERSON        
20110131013646.000|20110131013647.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS OF THE PROTESTS AND    
20110131013647.000|20110131013648.000|CC1|MILITARY RESPONSE.              
20110131013648.000|20110131013649.000|CC1|>> NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE IT  
20110131013649.000|20110131013651.000|CC1|BEFORE.                         
20110131013651.000|20110131013653.000|CC1|I KIND OF -- I WALKED OUT INTO  
20110131013653.000|20110131013654.000|CC1|THE CROWDS AND KIND OF SAW WHAT 
20110131013654.000|20110131013657.000|CC1|WAS GOING ON.                   
20110131013657.000|20110131013658.000|CC1|THERE WAS A LOT OF, I DON'T

20110131015806.000|20110131015807.000|CC1|THIS WEEKEND, SOLDIERS SURVEYED 
20110131015807.000|20110131015810.000|CC1|THE DAMAGE.                     
20110131015810.000|20110131015812.000|CC1|14 CASES, PRICELESS ARTIFACTS,  
20110131015812.000|20110131015813.000|CC1|DAMAGED BY THIEVES WHO SEEM TO  
20110131015813.000|20110131015815.000|CC1|BE HUNTING FOR GOLD.
